alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Jim Hogg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:08AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Areas of fog affecting the Northern Ranchlands... Surface observations and satellite imagery indicate that areas of fog and patchy dense fog are developing across portions of the Northern Ranchlands counties of Jim Hogg and Brooks. Visibilities will be reduced to 1 to 3 miles in general with these areas of fog. Some areas of dense fog may reduce visibilities to one half of a mile in some locations over the next couple of hours. These areas of fog will then lift and burn off later this morning with visibilities improving as a result. Early morning motorists, especially in the Hebbronville area, are urged to reduce speed, use low beam headlights, and avoid following other vehicles too closely in areas of fog through the morning hours.
